subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Manny Pacquiao  has turned his attention to the former welterweight champion Antonio Margarito for a November fight, after his promoter could not get a deal signed with Floyd Mayweather Jr.
snippet: Manny Pacquiao  has turned his attention to the former welterweight champion Antonio Margarito for a November fight, after his promoter could not get a deal signed with Floyd Mayweather Jr.
